attributes.action: know that we will never Vote until u  help the smokers who are out in the cold in  ice n rain with kids too
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We will not be voting again until some thing is done for the smokers ....  Us smokers have been made to feel like second or 3rd class citizens check out  the empty pubs  with people in the doorways or carparks with tiny children, and children some in party clothes... i think u have made a big mistake alienating us like this ....why cant there be  pubs or clubs   just for the smokers with  extractor fans ...ok pubs are only full if they do dinners n then people leave fast to get out for a smoke.....Please do something before we all die of pneumonia
 and I hope smokers of England Ireland Wales and Scotland  start  to make a stand  lets unite all together..WE are not gonna Vote til u do something for us

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
